document_data.name: Long Passage
document_data.mainbody: The '''Long Passage''' was a hallway in [[Castle Obarskyr]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1479}}, during the aftermath of the massacre during the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, the Marchioness [[Immerdusk]], [[Storm Silverhand]], while trying to furtively leave, was seeking the Long Passage when along the way she overheard the [[War Wizard]] [[Surgol Velard]] in the [[Mages' Dutychamber]] and took a detour to free her own comrade, mask dancer [[Amarune Whitewave]].
